title: Why do you scare the name of Mrs. Plocher the horses in "the young Frankenstein "?
subtitle: For some of us, the desire to believe that we were allowed to enter into a piece of secret knowledge can overcome our good sense.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The horses in the "Young Frankenstein" reacted violently to the name of Ms. Blücher because it meant "glu" in German.
